Name: TinySHA1
URL: https://github.com/mohaps/TinySHA1
Revision: 2795aa8de91b1797defdfbff61ed93b22b5ced81
Date: 2024-07-15
License: ISC

Description:
A simple header only SHA1 implementation in C++ (no dependencies). Based on
the implementation in boost::uuid::details.

Changes:
Added a memset-0 to avoid compilation warnings.
